author: m.kalinin
content: There will be a beacon chain upgrade (Bellatrix), in the first place. The upgrade on the execution chain (Paris) is happening at a certain amount of total difficulty in about 2 weeks after that, probably 10 days after Bellatrix. Client software (both EL and CL) will be upgraded before Bellatrix, I guess 4 weeks before the fork is usual time when clients are released.

author: tersec
content:
https://blog.ethereum.org/2021/11/29/how-the-merge-impacts-app-layer/
> Relatedly, the DIFFICULTY opcode (0x44) will be updated and renamed to PREVRANDAO. Post-merge, it will return the output of the randomness beacon provided by the beacon chain. This opcode will thus be a stronger, albeit still biasable, source of randomness for application developers to use than BLOCKHASH.
